thread.title: "I want justice for Stephon Clark": Grandmother makes emotional plea

title: "I want justice for Stephon Clark": Grandmother makes emotional plea
text:
"I want justice for Stephon Clark": Grandmother makes emotional plea Monday, March 26, 2018 - 01:18 
The grandmother of 23-year-old Stephon Clark, who was killed by police in Sacramento on Sunday March 18th, pleaded for justice for her grandson. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The grandmother of 23-year-old Stephon Clark, who was killed by police in Sacramento on Sunday March 18th, pleaded for justice for her grandson. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
